	/* Function to detect opted out users */
	function __gaTrackerIsOptedOut() {
		return document.cookie.indexOf(disableStr + '=true') > -1;
	}

	/* Disable tracking if the opt-out cookie exists. */
	if ( __gaTrackerIsOptedOut() ) {
		window[disableStr] = true;
	}

	function __gaTrackerOptout() {
	  document.cookie = disableStr + '=true; expires=Thu, 31 Dec 2099 23:59:59 UTC; path=/';
	  window[disableStr] = true;
	}

});
</script>
<script>advads_items = { conditions: {}, display_callbacks: {}, display_effect_callbacks: {}, hide_callbacks: {}, backgrounds: {}, effect_durations: {}, close_functions: {}, showed: [] };</script><style type="text/css" id="palmerreport-layer-custom-css"></style><link rel="apple-touch-icon" sizes="180x180" href="/wp-content/uploads/fbrfg/apple-touch-icon.png?v=yyawbbNr0G">

		};
		</script>

	<div class="palmerreport-above-titlebar-and-menu-2" id="palmerreport-1328269927"><script async src="https://cdn.avantisvideo.com/avm/js/video-loader.js?id=9d5a4eb7-1d7f-4586-af39-dad1ea3d2b1b&tagId=1" id="avantisJS"> </script></div>	<div class="fl-clear"></div>

<div class="fl-page">	

	<div id="fl-main-content" class="fl-page-content" itemprop="mainContentOfPage" role="main">

		
<div class="container">
	<div class="row">

		
		<div class="fl-content fl-content-left col-md-8">
			<article class="fl-post" id="fl-post-33230" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="http://schema.org/BlogPosting">

	<header class="fl-post-header">
		<h1 class="fl-post-title" itemprop="headline">
			Donald Trump threatens to leave the country if he loses the election					</h1>
		<div class="fl-post-meta fl-post-meta-top"><span class="fl-post-author"><a href="https://www.palmerreport.com/author/billpalmer/" title="Posts by Bill Palmer" rel="author">Bill Palmer</a></span><span class="fl-sep"> | </span><span class="fl-post-date">9:03 pm EDT October 16, 2020</span><p id="breadcrumbs"><span><span><a href="https://www.palmerreport.com/">Palmer Report</a> » <span><a href="https://www.palmerreport.com/category/analysis/">Analysis</a></span></p></div><meta itemscope itemprop="mainEntityOfPage" itemtype="https://schema.org/WebPage" itemid="https://www.palmerreport.com/analysis/leave-the-country-if-he-loses-the-election-donald-trump-threatens/33230/" content="Donald Trump threatens to leave the country if he loses the election" /><meta itemprop="datePublished" content="2020-10-16" /><meta itemprop="dateModified" content="2020-10-16" /><div itemprop="publisher" itemscope itemtype="https://schema.org/Organization"><meta itemprop="name" content="Palmer Report"><div itemprop="logo" itemscope itemtype="https://schema.org/ImageObject"><meta itemprop="url" content="https://www.palmerreport.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/07/palmerreportLogo.jpg"></div></div><div itemscope itemprop="author" itemtype="https://schema.org/Person"><meta itemprop="url" content="https://www.palmerreport.com/author/billpalmer/" /><meta itemprop="name" content="Bill Palmer" /></div><div itemscope itemprop="image" itemtype="https://schema.org/ImageObject"><meta itemprop="url" content="https://www.palmerreport.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/donald-trump-3.jpg" /><meta itemprop="width" content="1024" /><meta itemprop="height" content="681" /></div><div itemprop="interactionStatistic" itemscope itemtype="https://schema.org/InteractionCounter"><meta itemprop="interactionType" content="https://schema.org/CommentAction" /><meta itemprop="userInteractionCount" content="0" /></div>	</header><!-- .fl-post-header -->

					<div class="fl-post-thumb">
			<img width="1024" height="681" src="https://www.palmerreport.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/donald-trump-3-1024x681.jpg" class="attachment-large size-large wp-post-image" alt="" loading="lazy" itemprop="image" srcset="https://s19137.pcdn.co/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/donald-trump-3.jpg 1024w, https://s19137.pcdn.co/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/donald-trump-3-300x200.jpg 300w, https://s19137.pcdn.co/wp-content/uploads/2019/06/donald-trump-3-768x511.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px" />		</div>

			
	<div class="fl-post-content clearfix" itemprop="text">
		<aside class="mashsb-container mashsb-main "><div class="mashsb-box"><div class="mashsb-count mash-large" style="float:left;"><div class="counts mashsbcount">16118</div><span class="mashsb-sharetext">SHARES</span></div><div class="mashsb-buttons"><a class="mashicon-facebook mash-large mashsb-noshadow" href="https://www.facebook.com/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.palmerreport.com%2Fanalysis%2Fleave-the-country-if-he-loses-the-election-donald-trump-threatens%2F33230" target="_top" rel="nofollow"><span class="icon"></span><span class="text">Facebook&nbsp;Share</span></a><a class="mashicon-twitter mash-large mashsb-noshadow" target="_top" rel="nofollow"><span class="icon"></span><span class="text">Twitter&nbsp;Share</span></a><a class="mashicon-mail mash-large mashsb-noshadow" href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection#" target="_top" rel="nofollow"><span class="icon"></span><span class="text">Print&nbsp;Article</span></a><div class="onoffswitch mash-large mashsb-noshadow"></div><div class="secondary-shares" style="display:none;"><a class="mashicon-linkedin mash-large mashsb-noshadow" target="_top" rel="nofollow"><span class="icon"></span><span class="text">Reddit</span></a><a class="mashicon-stumbleupon mash-large mashsb-noshadow" rel="nofollow"><span class="icon"></span><span class="text">Stumbleupon</span></a><a class="mashicon-buffer mash-large mashsb-noshadow" target="_top" rel="nofollow"><span class="icon"></span><span class="text">Buffer</span></a><a class="mashicon-tumblr mash-large mashsb-noshadow" target="_top" rel="nofollow"><span class="icon"></span><span class="text">Pocket</span></a><a class="mashicon-line mash-large mashsb-noshadow" href="http://line.me/R/msg/text/?Donald+Trump+threatens+to+leave+the+country+if+he+loses+the+election%20https%3A%2F%2Fwww.palmerreport.com%2Fanalysis%2Fleave-the-country-if-he-loses-the-election-donald-trump-threatens%2F33230" target="_top" rel="nofollow"><span class="icon"></span><span class="text">Line</span></a><div class="onoffswitch2 mash-large mashsb-noshadow" style="display:none;"></div></div></div>
            </div>
                <div style="clear:both;"></div></aside>
            <!-- Share buttons by mashshare.net - Version: 3.7.7--><div class="palmerreport-0bd016e9ca6f07cb134491a1dc1db575" id="palmerreport-0bd016e9ca6f07cb134491a1dc1db575"></div><p>When you consider that New York has a well documented grand jury in the process of criminally indicting Donald Trump on state charges, in addition to whatever federal charges he&#8217;s facing, it&#8217;s fairly clear that Trump will be on a path to prison if he loses the election. Considering his strong ties to certain enemy nations, there are plenty of observers who believe Trump could try to flee the country if he loses.</p>
<div class="palmerreport-22dd19f6c4585ae974c86710451385bd" id="palmerreport-22dd19f6c4585ae974c86710451385bd"></div><p>So it&#8217;s notable that on the campaign trail today, Donald Trump stated that &#8220;I might have to leave the country&#8221; if he loses the election. To be clear, he was framing it within the <a href="https://twitter.com/davidmackau/status/1317263811737432064" rel="noopener noreferrer" target="_blank">context</a> of being embarrassed about losing to Joe Biden, whom he&#8217;s dubbed the &#8220;worst candidate in the history of politics.&#8221;</p>
<div class="palmerreport-fea83e408d8b9c143998d8ee3acbebff" id="palmerreport-fea83e408d8b9c143998d8ee3acbebff"></div><p>But it&#8217;s still interesting that Trump has now reached the point where he&#8217;s openly talking about leaving the country if he loses the election. Whether he was being sarcastic or not, it was a little bit too on-the-nose. You have to wonder if Trump said this tonight because he&#8217;s been seriously kicking around the fantasy of actually fleeing the country if he loses.</p><div class="palmerreport-ce714f65acaeeb7694e174c4e70ce161" id="palmerreport-ce714f65acaeeb7694e174c4e70ce161"></div><div class="palmerreport-post-block5-second-ad-desktop-only" style="float: left; " id="palmerreport-2086451727"><a href="https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=4Q29Y8DYQF4TU&source=url" target="_blank"><font color="000000"><b>Donate $5 now</b></font><font color="000000"> to help Palmer Report's editorial takedown of Donald Trump:</font></a>
<form action="https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr" method="post" target="_top">
<input type="hidden" name="cmd" value="_s-xclick" />
<input type="hidden" name="hosted_button_id" value="X27SGZMDWTAX6" />

<div class="onoffswitch mash-small mashsb-noshadow"></div>

Date,i=e.createElement(n),d=e.getElementsByTagName(n)[0],i.async=1,i.src="https://www.google-analytics.com/analytics.js",d.parentNode.insertBefore(i,d)}(window,document,"script",0,"_advads_ga"),_advads_ga("create",n.UID,"auto",this.name),advanced_ads_ga_anonymIP&&_advads_ga("set","anonymizeIp",!0),_advads_ga(n.name+".send",a)):(window.console&&window.console.log("Advanced Ads Analytics >> using other's variable named `"+GoogleAnalyticsObject+"`"),window[GoogleAnalyticsObject]("create",n.UID,"auto",this.name),window[GoogleAnalyticsObject]("set","anonymizeIp",!0),window[GoogleAnalyticsObject](n.name+".send",a))};advanced_ads_check_adblocker(function(e){e&&"string"==typeof advanced_ads_ga_UID&&advanced_ads_ga_UID&&new t("advadsTracker",advanced_ads_ga_UID)})}();</script><a href="#" id="fl-to-top"><span class="sr-only">Scroll To Top</span><i class="fas fa-chevron-up" ebff","blog_id":1},{"id":"content","method":"placement","params":{"position":"before","index":2,"tag":"p","xpath":"","start_from_bottom":"1","cache-busting":"auto","ad_label":"default","placement_position":"","item_adblocker":"","pro_minimum_length":"0","words_between_repeats":"0","previous_method":"placement","previous_id":"content","post":{"id":33230,"author":"3","post_type":"post"},"wp_the_query":{"term_id":"","taxonomy":"","is_main_query":true,"is_rest_api":false,"page":1,"numpages":1,"is_archive":false,"is_search":false,"is_home":false,"is_404":false,"is_attachment":false,"is_singular":true,"is_front_page":false,"is_feed":false},"url_parameter":"\/analysis\/leave-the-country-if-he-loses-the-election-donald-trump-threatens\/33230\/","placement_type":"post_content","output":{"class":["palmerreport-content"],"placement_id":"content"},"global_output":true},"elementid":"palmerreport-22dd19f6c4585ae974c86710451385bd","blog_id":1},{"id":"after-content","method":"placement","params":{"previous_method":"placement","previous_id":"after-content","post":{"id":33230,"author":"3","post_type":"post"},"wp_the_query":{"term_id":"","taxonomy":"","is_main_query":true,"is_rest_api":false,"page":1,"numpages":1,"is_archive":false,"is_search":false,"is_home":false,"is_404":false,"is_attachment":false,"is_singular":true,"is_front_page":false,"is_feed":false},"url_parameter":"\/analysis\/leave-the-country-if-he-loses-the-election-donald-trump-threatens\/33230\/","placement_type":"post_bottom","output":{"class":["palmerreport-after-content"],"placement_id":"after-content"},"global_output":true},"elementid":"palmerreport-335a4723db56aa76433cb9974bc6c5e8","blog_id":1},{"id":"custom-position","method":"placement","params":{"placement":{"type":"custom_position"},"previous_method":"placement","previous_id":"custom-position","post":{"id":33230,"author":"3","post_type":"post"},"wp_the_query":{"term_id":"","taxonomy":"","is_main_query":true,"is_rest_api":false,"page":1,"numpages":1,"is_archive" <!-- Sidebar Sticky Code --> 

<script type='text/javascript'>
  $(document).ready(function() {
      var stickydiv = $('#stickyad');
      var stickyPosition = stickydiv.position();

      $(window).scroll(function() {
          var scrollBarPosition = $(window).scrollTop();

          if (scrollBarPosition & gt; = stickyPosition.top) {
              stickydiv.css({
                  'position': 'sticky',
                  'top': 5
              })

          } else {
              stickydiv.css({
                  'position': 'relative',
                  'top': 0
              })
          }

      })
  });
  </script> <div class="palmerreport-footer-sticky" id="palmerreport-1847115707"><div class="mobile_sticky_ad">

            visibility: hidden;
        }

                height: fit-content;
                width: 100%;
                background-color: transparent;
                bottom: 0;
                margin: 0 auto;
                visibility: visible;
                position: sticky;
                position: -webkit-sticky;
                position: -moz-sticky;
                position: -ms-sticky;
                position: -o-sticky;
 position: fixed;
bottom: 0;
